item.title: Call Me Perma
item.author: prma.dev@protonmail.com (Perma)
item.description: I find myself seated in the passenger’s seat of my mother’s car, as we make our way to an appointment with an educational psychologist. A sense of confusion and concern lingers within me, stemming from my mother’s sudden and puzzling reaction to my C-graded report card. The journey passes quietly, and we arrive at the specialist’s office without exchanging a word, leaving me still uncertain about the purpose of our visit.
